transcript: I have nothing to sell you the very first video I was just annoyed when I said that and then the comments just like poured on if it's like oh so I just need to be more explicit about this I people just don't know I have a 99 cent book and that's actually the one thing that I've struggled with is because like the internet doesn't do well with Nuance you know some people are like he's trying to make money and the book does make money the book makes probably about 60 000 a month in income relative to my income it's just like it's irrelevant my top employee makes a million plus a year like it doesn't do anything for me
